subject: Re: [junit] Remote pairing
msgSnippet: Yes, that s the one! Last time I looked, the website was totally empty, though. Would be interesting to see whether it works with a current version of Eclipse
messageBody:
Yes, that's the one! Last time I looked, the website was totally empty,
though.

Would be interesting to see whether it works with a current version of
Eclipse (although I doubt it...).

Cheers, Ilja

Mark Levison schrieb:
> A few minutes digging found that the plugin is called Sangam. Sourceforge:
> http://sangam.sourceforge.net/ and
> http://www.industriallogic.com/software/sangam.html. It appears to have been
> a collaboration of Industrial Logic and NC State university. A quick glance
> suggests the code was last edited in 2004. Still if it works who cares.
>
> Any one care to take a try?
>
> Cheers
> Mark
